abstract: Hennepin County Chief Judge Peter Cahill dismisses misdemeanor charges brought against 11 organizers of Black Lives Matter protest held in Minnesota's Mall of America.
lead_paragraph: A judge dismissed charges against organizers of a Black Lives Matter protest that drew thousands of demonstrators to the Mall of America on Dec. 20, disrupting Christmas shopping.

headline.main: Minnesota: Organizers of Protest at Mall Are Cleared by Judge
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: Organizers of Protest at Mall Are Cleared by Judge

snippet: A judge dismissed charges against organizers of a Black Lives Matter protest that drew thousands of demonstrators to the Mall of America on Dec. 20, disrupting Christmas shopping.
